text: :wave: Hey there! Last week we rolled out some big changes to the Polly free plan, and have added a ton of exciting new features to our paid plans.

attachments.fallback: :wave: Hey there! Today we're rolling out some big changes to the Polly free plan, and are adding a ton of exciting new features to our paid plans. Learn how to get <http://app.polly.ai/exports|CSV exports>, grant read/write access to teammates, <http://app.polly.ai/demographics|segment> your results by role or seniority, or analyze your data with filters, cross-tabs, and trend-charts.
attachments.text: Learn how to get <http://app.polly.ai/exports|CSV exports>, grant read/write access to teammates, <http://app.polly.ai/demographics|segment> your results by role or seniority, or analyze your data with filters, cross-tabs, and trend-charts.
attachments.title: Explore Polly's new features

attachments.fallback: These new features are available for free over the next 30 days, after which you'll go back to being on a free plan. Should you choose to upgrade to a paid plan, be sure to use `EARLYADOPTER50` for a 50% discount.
attachments.text: These new features are available for free for 30 days as of the 21st, after which you’ll go back to being on a free plan and *you will not be charged*. Should you choose to upgrade to a paid plan, be sure to use `EARLYADOPTER50` for a 50% discount – our way of thanking you for being an early adopter!
attachments.title: Your 30-day trial started Wednesday, March 21st
